3: Countless Program Ghosts stand in the path leading to 'Bianca'.
Every single one of these Program Ghosts bears a clear mark pointing to a direction... Tch, not even trying to be discreet anymore, uh?
Not that she could have, anyway, with so many of them standing out here. We need to get rid of these Program Ghosts to move ahead, though.
Right... And we don't have time to fix every one of them.
Lucia, this is a choice we need to make.
